about_the_game:
Crafted by the ship's alchemist Rick, a member of the “A Guidebook of Babel” development team, this album offers 30 unique, atmospheric tracks. Here's an excerpt from a conversation between Dog Mask and Rick:

"Create our own music for the Babel? Come on, I'm just an alchemist."
"Heh, remember the last auction, when I sat right next to you? Your eyes popped wider than Willie's when those musical instruments were up for bids! And your place... it's virtually a human instrument museum now."
"Alright, I'll admit, I am fascinated with these fancy gadgets from the ground. There's a sort of alchemical reaction in the sounds they produce…”
"Oh! So you're in? I gotta go tell Mandy--"
"You mean that Albireo Band fan? I heard about a funny fiasco she had back in the day."
"I've leveled up since then, alright? Like, that electric guitar on your wall, I won't mistake it for a racket anymore--"
“That. Is. A. Bass.”

Format: MP3 320, FLAC.

"Create our own music for the Babel? Come on, I'm just an alchemist."
